goar: An active recordesque framework for golang
===

Supports go 1.2 or later

## Documentation
````sh
(coming soon)
````

## Installation
```sh
go get -u github.com/obieq/goar
import "github.com/obieq/goar"
```

````sh
(coming soon)

Detailed examples can be found in the Orchestrate test files
````

## Tests

```sh
go test -cover
      or
ginkgo -cover
```
